description: The National Chinese Dogwood (Cornus kousa 'National') is an amazing ornamental tree. It has a beautiful structure, with a spreading canopy and bright green foliage. It stands out in any garden with its fragrant white flowers and white berries. These flowers bloom in the late spring, and the tree produces a bright display for months. Its easy-care nature and cultivation habits make this variety a convenient choice for many gardeners. This adaptable tree also thrives in a wide range of soils and weather conditions. Beyond its good looks, the National Chinese Dogwood is also disease-resistant and long-lived, with an average life expectancy of up to 50 years. It's an excellent choice to add interest to any landscape.
